mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Illuminated Bible containing the Old and New Testaments
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A large family bible with the inscription "To Susie Bell Vest from Robert Gambel See 8-25-1975". The title of the bible is " The Illuminated Bible containing the Old and New Testaments". The published date appears to be 1846? The bible is in poor and fragile condition. Handle with care.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Religion
Bible
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
